h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
h2_title: How to Access the Kingdom of Sahali
content: When you return it to the Drunken Boar, he’ll thank you, and declare that he’s now off in search of a meaty meal. He doesn’t actually want you to get some for him, and will set off himself to the Crouching Tiger Temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Access the Kingdom of Sahali'.
The content is as follows:
When you return it to the Drunken Boar, he’ll thank you, and declare that he’s now off in search of a meaty meal. He doesn’t actually want you to get some for him, and will set off himself to the Crouching Tiger Temple.
